title: WATCH | Where did the Berlin Wall once stand?
text:
... YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Tourists from all over the world come to Berlin looking for traces of the Wall, but 30 years after its fall they're hard to come by. Now guided tours help to fill in the blanks.

You can also follow the Wall with this handy map next time you're in the city.

WATCH: How the Brandenburg Gate in Berlin became a symbol of unification
